attributes.action: Recognise the Human Rights of the Hermaphroditic people in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Currently UK law does not recognise Hermaphrodite human beings. There are only 2 choices for sex on a passport and yet thousands upon thousands of children are born each year as hermaphrodites.

I propose an immediate debate on this matter and swiftest of resolutions to a problem that has plagued Western civilisation for thousands of years; the abuse of hermaphrodite human rights.
